long_description: These affordable road pedals are suitable for touring as well as urban riding because they're easy to ride. Low-profile cleat and binding system creates a stable interface between the shoe and pedal; large base is rideable even when cleats are not engaged. Recessed cleats allow you to walk on your cycling shoes if necessary. Low-maintenance sealed cartridge axle unit. Cleat tension is adjustable for each rider's preference.
short_description: These affordable road pedals are suitable for touring as well as urban riding because they're easy to ride.
